note: see Cornell and Silverman [1986]. Rings of Witt vectors and the number-theoretic aspect of complete local
title: Elliptic curves are a topic on the border of number theory and algebra geometry. An excellent introduction is Silverman
For a look at the state of the art

note: Grothendieck [1971], Artin [1973], and Milne [1980] (parts of which should probably be read first). Add Azumaya [1950] for the truth about lifting idempotents.
title: This book also has a nice treatment of Galois descent, carried further in Serre

Spectral sequences and other homological algebra, with geometric applications in mind: Grothendieck [1957]. The fundamental group and etale cohomology on the geometric side, and the theory of Hensel rings and etale extensions on the algebraic side

note: Intersection Theory: Serre [1957], Fulton [1983] and [1984]' and for the

title: For a beautiful application of Fulton's Theory to commutative algebra see the paper by Roberts in Hochster

author.literal: Determinantal rings and varieties: Bruns and Vetter [1988], DeConcini, Eisenbud and Procesi [1980

note: in press]. For a look at the (possible) future, see Gelfand, Kapranov and Zelevinsky [1993]. Primary decomposition and computation: Gianni, Trager, and Zacharias
title: For a surprising application to geometry see Gruson, Lazarsfeld, and Peskine
A current development of interest is given in Conca and Herzog
for two views of the problem of computing primary decomposition

note: Huneke, Watanabe, and others, starting with Hochster and Huneke [1990]. Much of this work is related to a group of homological conjectures nicely presented in Hochster [1975].
title: for a recent piece of theoretical work with computational overtones. Recent work in commutative algebra: The book on Cohen-Macaulay rings by Bruns and Herzog [1993] is an easy way to get a look at what has been going on lately. A broad view of the state of the field in 1987 may be had from the volume of papers
Recent progress in methods of commutative algebra using positive characteristic: The papers of Hochster
